channel.title: Malfunctioning Eddie's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content on Malfunctioning Eddie's Ramblings

item.title: AWX and execution/hop nodes, how hard can it be?
item.description: Intro and disclaimer With the migration of AWX to k8s (with the awx-operator) I kind of gotten stuck because I lost some connectivity to my test enviroment (AKS ins azure and ansible “clients” in my homelab). Yes I could fix the network but with with the release of ansible receptor I can just deploy a execution node in my homelab and execute everything from the execution node. How hard can it be.

Hi, My name is Stefan Coussens (Malfunctioning Eddie (yes like the robot on Futurama (https://futurama.fandom.com/wiki/Malfunctioning_Eddie)). This blog is not a blog but more like unhinged rambelings in a quest to understand things. 15 years Unix/linux admin and currently an ansible enthousiast. Blog hosted by github pages and made with hugo(m10c theme) .
